itunes:summary:
The Drinkin’ Bros present a special crossover episode with Front Toward Enemy with Dakota Meyer with special guest Mat Best and discuss the impact social distancing has on the economy, talk about Mat’s book “Thank You For My Service”, and Mat explains how his career in entertainment has matured from his Art15 days.

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
The Drinkin’ Bros present a special crossover episode with Front Toward Enemy with Dakota Meyer with special guest Mat Best and discuss the impact social distancing has on the economy, talk about Mat’s book “Thank You For My Service”, and Mat explains how his career in entertainment has matured from his Art15 days.
